values: The Final Divide: Eternal Life or Eternal Wrath, Part 3The Final Divide: Eternal Life or Eternal Wrath, Part 3

Look to Christ. Only he can save you, only he can satisfy you. There is no other Savior, there is no purer joy.Look to Christ. Only he can save you, only he can satisfy you. There is no other Savior, there is no purer joy.
